languages.text: "Я вижу глубину раскаяния Его Преосвященства и дарую ему право принять ту смерть, которую он себе избрал. Надеюсь, Император смилостивится над его душой".
languages.translation_comment:
Запускается этюд VP_CardinalPenance
Оставляем кардинала в живых — он уходит на свою личную казнь
Весы направо

languages.text: "I see the depth of the cardinal's contrition and grant him the right to embrace the death he has chosen. I hope the Emperor has mercy on his soul."
languages.original_text: "Я вижу глубину раскаяния Его Преосвященства и дарую ему право принять ту смерть, которую он себе избрал. Надеюсь, Император смилостивится над его душой".

traits.locale_text: "I see the depth of the cardinal's contrition and grant him the right to embrace the death he has chosen. I hope the Emperor has mercy on his soul."
"I see the depth of His Eminence's contrition and am willing to help toward its acceptance. I hope the Emperor has mercy on his soul."
"I see the depth of the cardinal's contrition and grant him the right to embrace the death he has chosen. I hope the Emperor has mercy on his soul."
"I see the depth of the cardinal's contrition and grant him the right to embrace the death he has chosen. I hope the Emperor has mercy on his soul."
"I see the depth of the cardinal's contrition and am willing to help toward its acceptance. I hope the Emperor has mercy on his soul."
"I see the depth of the cardinal's contrition and am willing to help toward its acceptance. I hope the Emperor has mercy on his soul."
"I see the depth of the cardinal's contrition and grant him the right to embrace the death he has chosen. I hope the Emperor has mercy on his soul."

languages.translation_comment:
Запускается этюд VP_CardinalPenance
Оставляем кардинала в живых — он уходит на свою личную казнь
Весы направо

languages.text: "Ich erkenne die tiefe Reue des Kardinals und gewähre ihm das Recht auf den von ihm gewählten Tod. Möge der Imperator seiner Seele gnädig sein."
languages.original_text: "I see the depth of the cardinal's contrition and grant him the right to embrace the death he has chosen. I hope the Emperor has mercy on his soul."

traits.locale_text: "Ich erkenne die tiefe Reue des Kardinals und gewähre ihm das Recht auf den von ihm gewählten Tod. Möge der Imperator seiner Seele gnädig sein."
"Ich sehe die aufrichtige Reue Seiner Eminenz und bin bereit, sie zu unterstützen. Möge der Imperator seiner Seele gnädig sein."

languages.text: « La contrition du cardinal me paraît évidente, aussi lui accorderai-je le droit d'embrasser la mort qu'il a choisie. J'espère que l'Empereur aura pitié de son âme. »
languages.original_text: "I see the depth of the cardinal's contrition and grant him the right to embrace the death he has chosen. I hope the Emperor has mercy on his soul."

traits.locale_text: « La contrition du cardinal me paraît évidente, aussi lui accorderai-je le droit d'embrasser la mort qu'il a choisie. J'espère que l'Empereur aura pitié de son âme. »
« La contrition de Son Éminence me paraît évidente, aussi suis-je {mf|prêt|prête} à l'aider à en convaincre le peuple. J'espère que l'Empereur aura pitié de son âme. »

languages.text: “这位红衣主教的决心让我深受触动。他有权踏上他所选择的死亡之路，愿帝皇宽恕他的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: "I see the depth of the cardinal's contrition and grant him the right to embrace the death he has chosen. I hope the Emperor has mercy on his soul."

traits.locale_text: “这位红衣主教的决心让我深受触动。他有权踏上他所选择的死亡之路，愿帝皇宽恕他的灵魂。”
“这位主教的决心让我深受感动。我愿意协助他完成最后的赎罪，愿帝皇宽恕他的灵魂。”

languages.text: «Veo el arrepentimiento del cardenal y le concedo el derecho a aceptar la muerte que ha elegido. Espero que el Emperador se apiade de su alma».
languages.original_text: "I see the depth of the cardinal's contrition and grant him the right to embrace the death he has chosen. I hope the Emperor has mercy on his soul."

traits.locale_text: «Veo el arrepentimiento del cardenal y le concedo el derecho a aceptar la muerte que ha elegido. Espero que el Emperador se apiade de su alma».
«Veo el arrepentimiento en el alma de su eminencia y le ayudaré a aceptarlo. Espero que el Emperador se apiade de su alma».

languages.text: 「猊下の悔恨の念の深さを目の当たりにし、その受諾に向けて喜んで協力する。皇帝陛下が彼の魂に慈悲を与えてくださることを願っている」
languages.original_text: "I see the depth of His Eminence's contrition and am willing to help toward its acceptance. I hope the Emperor has mercy on his soul."

traits.locale_text: 「猊下の悔恨の念の深さを目の当たりにし、その受諾に向けて喜んで協力する。皇帝陛下が彼の魂に慈悲を与えてくださることを願っている」

languages.text: "Kardinalin samimi pişmanlığının derinliğini görüyor ve seçtiği şekilde ölümü kucaklama hakkını bahşediyorum. İmparator ruhuna merhamet eylesin."
languages.original_text: "I see the depth of the cardinal's contrition and grant him the right to embrace the death he has chosen. I hope the Emperor has mercy on his soul."

traits.locale_text: "Kardinalin samimi pişmanlığının derinliğini görüyor ve seçtiği şekilde ölümü kucaklama hakkını bahşediyorum. İmparator ruhuna merhamet eylesin."
"Sayın Kardinal'in samimi pişmanlığının derinliğini görüyor ve talebinin kabulüne razı oluyorum. İmparator ruhuna merhamet eylesin."
